description: Negronis are all the rage for good reason! The perfect blend of bitter and sweet, this cocktail has been on fire lately. But smoky mezcal adds just what you need at holiday parties - some seasonal flavor that will warm your heart with its smokey warmth as it warms up outside tonight.
name: Mezcal Negroni
